attributes.description:
The Porsche 944 S2 Cabriolet was introduced in 1989 powered by a 208 hp naturally aspirated, dual-overhead-cam 16-valve 3.0 L version of the 944 S' engine. It was the largest production 4-cylinder engine of its time. The 944 S2 also received a revised transmission and gearing to better suit the 3.0 L powerplant. The 944 S2 had the same rounded nose and a rear valance found on the Turbo model. It was available until 1992. 
Finished in guards red, one of Porsches most famous colours it is a real beauty. The paintwork on the car is in fair condition for the age and mileage, with only some minor stone chips on the front end and a slight imperfection on the leading edge of the driver’s door. 

No major blemishes are visible on the alloy wheels. Over 7mm of tread remains across all four tyres.

Moving inside, the cabin presents very well, with the black leather in a good condition it does have some minor age-related creasing on the seats and a little wear on some of the main touchpoints, including the gear knob.  The gear boot has recently been refinished to match the rest of the interior.
attributes.title: 1989 Porsche 944 S2 Cabriolet

attributes.description:
Extra Features:
Standard forward-collision warning and automated emergency braking, Soft close doors, Leather interior in two-tone combination - smooth-finish leather Black, Interior package in Black, Paddle shifters, Head up display, Navigation System, Exclusive design gear selector, Auto adjustable front seats 18 way, Heating/cooling functions with memory, 12.3” touchscreen infotainment system, Porsche Connect Plus which includes a 4G LTE mobile Wi-Fi hotspot and Apple CarPlay capability, Wireless phone charging, Alcantara roof liner.

Carrara white metallic exterior, 21” Cayenne Turbo wheels with wheel arch extensions in exterior color, Porsche InnoDrive including adaptive cruise control, Adaptive air suspension, LED Matrix main headlights including Porsche dynamic light system plus, ParkAssist (front and rear) including reversing camera and surround view.

Stunning both in and out. Comes with valid AA reports
5% DISCOUNT on all cash deals. For all purchases within 5days, we’ll throw in full tank petrol/diesel, or a full vacuum. 

Financed vehicle are charged at an addition R40 000, require a 10% upfront deposit, and an additional R1990 administrative fee.
